PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1999-07411999-04-220,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  , 
PrecisEnactment of the CINEMATOGRAPHIC WORKS (RIGHT TO REMUNERATION) REGULATIONS which allow a performer in a "prescribed cinematographic work" to enforce their right to remuneration (royalties) in accordance with the original agreement between the performer and the producer or any assignee or subsequent holder of the copyright.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 1999-0194 Publication Date: 1999-05-12
Attachments
precis:
Enactment of the CINEMATOGRAPHIC WORKS (RIGHT TO REMUNERATION) REGULATIONS
which allow a performer in a "prescribed cinematographic work" to enforce
their right to remuneration (royalties) in accordance with the original
agreement between the performer and the producer or any assignee or
subsequent holder of the copyright.
